sentences.en: A business can not thrive without good management.
sentences.cn: 商业管理不好是兴旺不起来的.

sentences.en: a business which managed to thrive during a recession
sentences.cn: 在经济萧条时期也能顺利发展的一家企业

sentences.en: Babies thrive on their mother's milk.
sentences.cn: 婴儿靠吃母乳长得很健壮.

sentences.en: Children thrive on fresh air and good food.
sentences.cn: 儿童的健康成长需要有新鲜的空气和富有营养的食物.

sentences.en: Creative people are usually very determined and thrive on overcoming obstacles.
sentences.cn: 富有创造力的人一般都意志非常坚定，能不断克服困难，事业蒸蒸日上。

sentences.en: Few plants or animals thrive in the desert.
sentences.cn: 极少数植物或动物能在沙漠中茁壮成长.

sentences.en: He that by the plough would thrive himself must either hold or drive.
sentences.cn: 想靠犁杖过好日子的人必须亲自扶犁或亲自驾驭牲口.

sentences.en: He that will thrive, must rise at five.
Hindley was nought, and would never thrive as where he wandered.
sentences.cn: 辛德雷没出息, 不管他荡到哪儿也永远不会发迹的.

sentences.en: Many people thrive on a stressful lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 有许多人喜欢充满压力的生活方式。

sentences.en: New businesses thrive in this area.
sentences.cn: 新商家在这一地区蓬勃兴起。

sentences.en: Now that the highway is finished, the shopping centre should thrive.
sentences.cn: 由于这条公路已经竣工, 那个商业中心一定会兴隆起来.

sentences.en: plants that thrive in tropical rain forests
sentences.cn: 在热带雨林蓬勃生长的植物

sentences.en: These animals thrive on the leaves of certain trees.
sentences.cn: 这些动物靠吃某些树的叶子长壮.

sentences.en: They thrive only in suitable soil and a temperate climate.
sentences.cn: 茶花这东西有点特性,水壤气候,事事都得细心.

sentences.en: This flowering plant will thrive and bloom wherever you plant it.
sentences.cn: 这种花随便你种在哪儿都能活.

sentences.en: Today his company continues to thrive.
sentences.cn: 今天，他的公司继续蓬勃发展。

words.tran_cn: 繁荣的；蒸蒸日上的；旺盛的

trans.tran_en: to become very successful or very strong and healthy

trans.tran_cn: 兴盛，兴隆，长得健壮，茁壮成长
trans.tran_en: to become very successful or very strong and healthy
